title: Augusta County: Geraldine McGuffin to John B. McGuffin, [no date]
summary: Geraldine McGuffin writes to her cousin, John B. McGuffin, with news from home, including other members of the extended McGuffin family. She also writes that she has fallen in love with a cousin of hers from Louisiana. Although there is no date, the tone of the letter possibly places it in the early years of the war.
keywords: Women, Family. Patriotism, Home Front, American Civil War
